info.name: Trimps Gradient Theme: Default Colors
info.description:
The Trimps Gradient Theme, but all beaten cells remain green.

Note: If you use this with the in-game Gradient Theme, beaten cells will become colored. As such, this theme only works with the Default and Dark themes.
info.additionalInfo:
Trimps 4.4 Update: Added Token Enemy Colors

Trimps 4.5 Update: Added Liquimp Color

Trimps 4.51 Update: Added Pumpkimp Colors
